org.agilewiki.jactor2.osgi

Class Activator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.ActorBase
      • org.agilewiki.jactor2.osgi.JAContextActivator
        • org.agilewiki.jactor2.osgi.FactoryLocatorActivator
          • org.agilewiki.jactor2.osgi.Activator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, Actor, org.osgi.framework.BundleActivator, org.osgi.service.cm.ManagedService

    public class Activator
extends FactoryLocatorActivator
    Activator for the jactor2-osgi bundle, that provides all the pre-defined durable factories.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected boolean configImports()
      Returns true (the default) when a config file is used to define the imports of the factory locator.

      Creates a factory locator and adds it to the mailbox factory's properties.
